alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the semicarbazide functional group with the general structure R1(N)R2NR3C(=O)N(R4)R5 (R1-R5=H, alkyl, aryl), a derivative of urea, where the amine group on one side has been replace by a hydrazine group.
alternative_parents.name: Semicarbazides

alternative_parents.description: Organonitrogen compounds with the general formula O=CN(R)-N=O, where R=H or organyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Nitrosamides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a bond between carbon a pnictogen atom. Pnictogens are p-block element atoms that are in the group 15 of the periodic table.
alternative_parents.name: Organopnictogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a carbonyl group, with the general structure RC(=O)R', where R=organyl, R'=H, N, O, organyl group or halide group.
alternative_parents.name: Carbonyl compounds

class.description: Compounds comprising the organic carbonic acid or a derivative thereof.
class.name: Organic carbonic acids and derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as n-methylnitrosoureas. These are organonitrogen compounds with the general formula H3CN(N=O)R(N)=O (R = any atom).

direct_parent.description: Organonitrogen compounds with the general formula H3CN(N=O)R(N)=O (R = any atom).
direct_parent.name: N-methylnitrosoureas

intermediate_nodes.description: Compounds containing a nitro group and an urea group N-N linked together, with the general structure R1N(R2)C(=O)N(R3)N=O.
intermediate_nodes.name: Nitrosoureas

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Compounds containing two amine groups joined by a carbonyl (C=O) functional group.
subclass.name: Ureas

superclass.description: Compounds an organic acid or a derivative thereof.
superclass.name: Organic acids and derivatives
